name: Corporate Strategy & Planning
description: Enterprise-level strategic planning, long-term vision development, and strategic initiative management. APQC PCF 1.0 Develop Vision and Strategy. Three stated strategic priorities per FY2024 10-K: operational turnaround, innovation, capital structure optimization.

name: Business Transformation
description: Enterprise-wide transformation program management and execution. APQC PCF 1.3 Manage Strategic Initiatives. Two-segment reorganization into Public Cloud and Private Cloud business units initiated under CEO leadership.

name: Corporate Governance
description: Board of directors oversight, committee governance, and corporate secretary functions. APQC PCF 1.2.5 Create Organizational Design. Board includes Audit, Compensation, Nominating & Corporate Governance, and Executive committees per SEC proxy filings.

name: Service Portfolio Management
description: Management of the end-to-end cloud, AI, data, applications, and security services portfolio across Public Cloud and Private Cloud segments. APQC PCF 2.1 Manage Product and Service Portfolio. Portfolio spans consulting, professional services, managed services, and elastic engineering delivery models.

name: Platform & Product Engineering
description: Design, development, and lifecycle management of proprietary platforms and technology products. APQC PCF 2.2 Develop Products and Services. Includes Rackspace Fabric unified governance platform, Rackspace Spot cloud marketplace, OpenStack Flex, and Rackspace Cloud Management Platform.

name: AI Product & Solution Development
description: Development of AI-specific platforms, accelerators, and solution architectures. APQC PCF 2.2 Develop Products and Services. Includes Rackspace AI Business platform (GPU infrastructure on Dell/NVIDIA), RAISE AI Security Engine, FAIR accelerators, and Agentic AI solutions.

name: Sovereign Cloud Engineering
description: Engineering and delivery of jurisdiction-specific sovereign cloud solutions meeting national data sovereignty requirements. APQC PCF 2.2 Develop Products and Services. UK Sovereign Cloud supports PSN and NHS Digital workloads; broader sovereign cloud strategy for regulated markets.

name: Market Intelligence & Analysis
description: Market research, competitive analysis, customer needs assessment, and industry trend identification. APQC PCF 3.1 Understand Markets, Customers, and Capabilities. Supports 81,000+ customers across 120 countries per FY2024 10-K.

name: Marketing & Demand Generation
description: Brand strategy, content marketing, digital marketing, demand generation, field marketing, and events management. APQC PCF 3.2/3.4 Develop Marketing Strategy and Develop/Manage Marketing Plans.

name: Direct Sales
description: Direct sales execution across Public Cloud, Private Cloud, Enterprise, and regional segments. APQC PCF 3.5 Develop and Manage Sales Plans. 400+ quota-bearing sales representatives and customer success managers per FY2024 10-K.

name: Channel & Partner Sales
description: Indirect sales through channel partners, resellers, and marketplace listings. APQC PCF 3.5.6 Manage Sales Partners and Alliances. Global Partner Program extends direct sales force; AWS Marketplace listings include RRMO.

name: Strategic Alliance Management
description: Management of hyperscaler and technology vendor alliance partnerships. APQC PCF 3.3.2 Develop Sales Partner/Alliance Relationships. AWS Strategic Collaboration Agreement (Oct 2024), Microsoft, Google Cloud, Oracle, VMware, Dell, NVIDIA, and Palantir partnerships.

name: Industry Vertical Go-to-Market
description: Industry-specific solution packaging, messaging, and sales execution across vertical markets. APQC PCF 3.1.1 Perform Customer and Market Intelligence Analysis. Dedicated practices for healthcare, financial services, government, manufacturing, retail, education, PE, and 10+ additional verticals.

name: Public Cloud Managed Services
description: 24x7x365 managed operations, monitoring, incident response, and optimization for customer workloads on AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Public Cloud segment revenue $1,682M in FY2024. ISG Provider Lens Leader across all three hyperscalers.

name: Private Cloud Managed Services
description: Managed hosting, private cloud operations, and infrastructure management in Rackspace and customer data centers. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Private Cloud segment revenue $1,055M in FY2024. Includes OpenStack, VMware Cloud Foundation, and dedicated hosting platforms.

name: Hybrid & Multicloud Orchestration
description: Integration and management of workloads across public, private, and hybrid cloud environments. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Rackspace Fabric platform provides unified governance, ticketing, billing, and tagging across multi-platform IT estates.

name: Cloud Migration & Adoption
description: Planning, execution, and management of customer workload migrations from on-premises to cloud environments. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Migration Acceleration Program (MAP) partnership with AWS; Rackspace Rapid Migration Offer (RRMO) on AWS Marketplace.

name: Cloud Optimization & FinOps
description: Continuous optimization of cloud resource utilization, cost management, and financial operations for cloud consumption. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Dedicated FinOps Practice with certified practitioners; FinOps & Cloud Cost Optimization department.

name: Elastic Engineering Service Delivery
description: On-demand, pod-based access to certified cloud engineering teams across infrastructure, security, data, and application domains. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Dedicated engineering pods assigned to customer engagements; operates across all hyperscaler platforms and multiple technology specializations.

name: Managed Security Services
description: Customer-facing security operations including Managed XDR, SIEM, threat detection and response, and compliance monitoring. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. ISG Provider Lens Leader for Cybersecurity Solutions & Services 2025; 800+ security certifications.

name: DDoS & Web Application Security
description: Web application firewall, DDoS protection, bot mitigation, and API security service delivery. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Akamai App & API Protector managed by Elastic Engineering for Security; AWS Shield, WAF, and Firewall Manager as certified MSSP partner.

name: Cyber Recovery & Resilience
description: Disaster recovery, cyber recovery, and business continuity services for customer environments. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Includes Cyber Recovery Cloud platform and incident response capabilities.

name: Compliance Services
description: Regulatory compliance monitoring, assessment, and reporting services for customer environments. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Covers PCI DSS, HIPAA, SOC, FedRAMP, CMMC, and GDPR compliance assistance across multicloud environments.

name: AI & Machine Learning Service Delivery
description: Delivery of AI strategy, implementation, and managed AI operations for customers. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. FAIR practice with 70+ enterprise AI implementations; covers generative AI, agentic AI, model deployment, and AI lifecycle management.

name: Data Modernization & Analytics
description: Data strategy, data pipeline modernization, analytics, business intelligence, and database managed services for customers. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. ISG Provider Lens Leader for Data Analytics and AI/ML on AWS; 300+ certified DBAs; Snowflake, Databricks, and data lake practices.

name: Application Modernization & Development
description: Application modernization, cloud native development, containerization, and SaaS lifecycle management for customers. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Includes Kubernetes practice, IoT and edge computing, and application integration services.

name: Enterprise Application Services
description: Managed services and elastic engineering for enterprise applications including SAP, ServiceNow, Microsoft Dynamics 365, Sitecore, and Oracle applications. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. TriCore acquisition (2017) established SAP practice foundation.

name: Consulting & Advisory Services
description: Strategic cloud consulting, multicloud strategy development, solutions architecture, and technology advisory engagements. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. IDC MarketScape Major Player for Worldwide Cloud Professional Services 2024.

name: Professional Services Delivery
description: Project-based delivery of cloud adoption, migration, implementation, and build services. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Covers landing zone setup, infrastructure-as-code templates, and go-live support.

name: Data Center Operations
description: Physical operations, maintenance, and management of Rackspace-owned and operated data center facilities across four continents. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Includes power, cooling, physical security, environmental monitoring, capacity planning, and smart hands operations.

name: Colocation Services
description: Customer colocation hosting in Rackspace data center facilities with cross-connect and connectivity services. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Provides rack space, power, and network connectivity for customer-owned hardware.

name: Email & Productivity Services
description: Hosted email, Microsoft 365, and collaboration services for business customers. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Rackspace Email and Cloud Office platforms; email migration services for customer transitions.

name: Network Engineering & Connectivity
description: Network architecture, engineering, and managed connectivity services including RackConnect, MPLS, and cloud interconnection. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. AS12200 BGP edge infrastructure; Megaport and Equinix exchange gateways for hybrid connectivity.

name: Site Reliability Engineering
description: SRE practices, observability engineering, monitoring, alerting, and AIOps-driven operational intelligence for customer environments. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Google Cloud's first CRE managed service partner; 1B+ automated actions per month.

name: Managed Backup & Disaster Recovery
description: Backup management, data protection, and disaster recovery services for customer environments. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Includes Rubrik-based backup technology and cross-platform DR solutions.

name: Government Cloud Services
description: FedRAMP-authorized cloud and managed services for federal, state, local, and education customers. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Rackspace Government Cloud (RGC) on AWS and VMware; CMMC compliance support; Carahsoft GSA partnership.

name: Governed Managed Operations
description: Managed operations for enterprise software platforms requiring governance, security, and compliance controls. APQC PCF 4.4 Deliver Service to Customer. Palantir partnership (Feb 2026) to run Foundry and AIP in production; 30 trained engineers scaling to 250+.

name: Hardware & Technology Procurement
description: Procurement of servers, network equipment, storage, and technology components for data center and service delivery operations. APQC PCF 4.2 Procure Materials and Services. Dell Technologies alliance for private cloud and AI infrastructure; NVIDIA GPU procurement for AI workloads.

name: Customer Success Management
description: Customer lifecycle management, account health monitoring, retention, and expansion. APQC PCF 5.0 Manage Customer Service. Fanatical Experience brand; Customer Success Center for executive briefings; Technical Account Management for named accounts.

name: Global Technical Support
description: 24x7x365 technical support operations including incident management, problem resolution, and escalation management. APQC PCF 5.2 Plan and Manage Customer Service Operations. Tiered support model with global delivery centers in US, UK, India, Egypt, and Mexico.

name: Service Delivery Management
description: Service level management, engagement management, and delivery governance for managed services customers. APQC PCF 5.1 Develop Customer Care Strategy. SLA management, service reviews, and continuous service improvement.

name: Talent Acquisition & Workforce Planning
description: Recruitment, hiring, and strategic workforce planning across global operations. APQC PCF 6.2 Recruit, Source, and Select Employees. Supports 6,500+ employee base across 60+ cities and 120 countries.

name: Learning & Certification
description: Employee training, cloud certification programs, and professional development. APQC PCF 6.3.5 Develop and Train Employees. Rackspace University administers 52+ Learning Hours initiative; 8,000+ certifications across 45 technologies; Rackspace Cloud Academy.

name: Employee Experience & Retention
description: Employee engagement, total rewards, compensation, benefits administration, and retention programs. APQC PCF 6.4 Reward and Retain Employees. Racker Experience program; DE&I initiatives; historically recognized on Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For.

name: HR Operations & Administration
description: Core HR administration, payroll, benefits processing, employee data management, and HR technology systems. APQC PCF 6.6 Manage Employee Information and 8.5 Process Payroll. Multi-country HR operations across Americas, EMEA, and APJ regions.

name: Internal IT Management
description: Internal enterprise IT strategy, architecture, service delivery, and end-user support for corporate systems. APQC PCF 7.0 Manage Information Technology. ServiceNow ITSM platform; internal data and analytics consolidated 70 data warehouses.

name: Enterprise Information Security
description: Internal information security governance, risk management, and cybersecurity operations protecting Rackspace corporate and customer-facing infrastructure. APQC PCF 7.3.4 Develop and Implement Security Controls. Cyber Defense Center provides 24x7x365 internal and customer security monitoring.

name: Internal Data & Analytics
description: Internal business intelligence, data warehouse management, and operational analytics for corporate decision-making. APQC PCF 7.4 Manage Enterprise Information. Consolidated 70 data warehouses; reduced cycle time by 50 percent per corporate reporting.

name: Financial Planning & Analysis
description: Budgeting, forecasting, financial planning, and management accounting across two reportable segments. APQC PCF 8.1 Perform Planning and Management Accounting. Supports $2.7B revenue across Public Cloud and Private Cloud segments.

name: Financial Reporting & Accounting
description: SEC regulatory reporting, GAAP financial statements, consolidation, and statutory reporting. APQC PCF 8.3 Perform General Accounting and Reporting. NASDAQ-listed (RXT); quarterly 10-Q and annual 10-K filings; multi-entity consolidation across global subsidiaries.

name: Treasury & Capital Structure Management
description: Cash management, debt management, capital structure optimization, and banking relationships. APQC PCF 8.7 Manage Treasury Operations. $2.8B long-term debt; March 2024 refinancing; $375M revolving credit facility; $144M cash as of December 2024.

name: Tax Management
description: Tax strategy, compliance, and planning across multiple jurisdictions. APQC PCF 8.9 Manage Taxes. Multi-country tax obligations across 120+ countries of operation; transfer pricing for global subsidiary structure.

name: Internal Audit & Controls
description: Internal audit, SOX compliance, internal controls over financial reporting, and enterprise risk assessment. APQC PCF 8.8 Manage Internal Controls. Board Audit Committee oversight; required for NASDAQ-listed public company.

name: Revenue Operations & Billing
description: Revenue recognition, customer billing, order management, and accounts receivable. APQC PCF 8.2 Perform Revenue Accounting. Billing and Order Management for consumption-based and subscription pricing models across two segments.

name: Facilities & Property Management
description: Corporate office management, data center real estate strategy, lease administration, and facility operations. APQC PCF 9.0 Acquire, Construct, and Manage Property. Global footprint across 60+ cities on four continents; UK office closure noted in FY2024 10-K.

name: Sustainability & ESG
description: Environmental sustainability, energy management, ESG reporting, and responsible AI governance. APQC PCF 10.0 Manage Environmental Health and Safety. Data center energy and facilities management; supply chain sustainability; corporate responsibility programs.

name: Investor Relations
description: Investor communications, financial analyst engagement, earnings management, and SEC filing coordination. APQC PCF 11.1 Build Investor Relationships. Quarterly earnings calls, annual shareholder meetings, and institutional investor outreach for NASDAQ: RXT.

name: Legal & Corporate Affairs
description: Corporate legal counsel, contract management, intellectual property protection, M&A legal, and corporate secretary functions. APQC PCF 11.4 Manage Legal and Ethical Issues. Office of General Counsel; government contracting and procurement compliance.

name: Privacy & Data Protection
description: Enterprise privacy program management, data protection compliance, and privacy-by-design implementation. APQC PCF 11.4 Manage Legal and Ethical Issues. GDPR, CCPA, and multi-jurisdictional privacy regulation compliance across 120 countries of customer operations.

name: Corporate Communications & Public Relations
description: External communications, media relations, press releases, and corporate reputation management. APQC PCF 11.5 Manage Public Relations Program. Supports analyst relations for ISG, Gartner, IDC, Everest, and Forrester recognition programs.

name: Community Investment & Philanthropy
description: Corporate social responsibility, community engagement, and philanthropic programs. APQC PCF 11.5.1 Manage Community Relations. Rackspace Foundation focused on STEM education and community investment.

name: Thought Leadership & Technology Evangelism
description: Industry thought leadership, technology evangelism, AI research publications, and external knowledge sharing. APQC PCF 12.3 Develop Enterprise-wide Knowledge Management Capability. Technology Evangelism department; AI Research & Publications; OpenStack community contributions.

name: ITSM & Service Management
description: IT service management processes, ITIL practices, and continuous service improvement for both internal and customer-facing operations. APQC PCF 13.0 Develop and Manage Business Capabilities. ITIL & Service Management department; ServiceNow platform for incident, change, and problem management.

name: Corporate Development & M&A
description: Mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, and strategic corporate development activities. APQC PCF 1.2 Develop Business Strategy. Historical acquisitions include Datapipe (2017), TriCore (2017), RelationEdge (2018), Onica (2019), Bright Skies (2020), and Just Analytics (2022).
